content: What is this stream about? why is it separate from the genomics thread? what is eEmerge?

I think this stream should be a sub-stream of #genomics . eMERGE is working on doing a pilot with the Genomics Reporting IG. At a recent WG meeting, it was suggested utilizing Zulip to discuss specific questions about the IG from this group. @Larry Babb can fill in any gaps I missed.

@Kevin Power Larry and I are planning on adding additional topics to this stream, can you move this stream to be a sub-stream of #genomics? If not, do we need to delete this stream and create as a new sub-stream under #genomics ?
I canâ€™t move it but maybe @Grahame Grieve can?
Can't move content between streams. However, we could close this stream and agree to use the other
Now is the time to do that then before we go any further
So I'm authorized to close the stream?
Can we still get to the existing content if you close it? We might want to at least copy/paste
It's going to have to be a delete, not a close, so yes copy whatever you want to keep
well, I can rename it genomics / eMerge Pilot
That is correct @Kevin Power . We'd like to capture these issues separately so that we can isolate the issues that may gate the progress of this pilot implementation.
@Grahame Grieve - feel free to rename
Renaming works for me. Sorry for any trouble. I just went for it. I'm a newbie to Zulip.
@Larry Babb no harm done
